While it can be crafted using extremely expensive resources including iron blocks and enchanted marine crystals, the more direct method to obtain it is by defeating Hombre Agua in battle. Wield it to command respect on both land and sea.
TridentBlock:0.CRDescription:0: A historical weapon, a symbol of Poseidon and Neptune, that does so much damage?

ScyteBlock:0.Description: The Scythe is a long, curved-bladed weapon originally designed as a farming tool for cutting crops, but in dark fantasy it is seen as a weapon of death, often wielded by demons, skeletons, and reapers. In this world, the Scythe cannot be crafted because it has no recipe and is extremely difficult to obtain. The only way to acquire the Scythe is by killing El Señor De Las Tumbas Moradas. Be careful: its lethality is extreme, capable of killing you with a single strike.

WoodAxeBlock:0.Description: Back to basics - like the old days
WoodAxeBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Back to basics - like the old days

WoodShovelBlock:0.Description: Simple digging - back when life was easier
WoodShovelBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Simple digging - back when life was easier

StoneMacheteBlock:0.Description: Back when stone could cut - version 2.0 memories
StoneMacheteBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Back when stone could cut - version 2.0 memories

StoneRakeBlock:0.Description: Ancient farming tool - back to roots
StoneRakeBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Ancient farming tool - back to roots

StonePickaxeBlock:0.Description: How could I forget the old days, bro? :")
StonePickaxeBlock:0.CRDescription:0: How could I forget the old days, bro? :")

LavaSpearBlock:0.Description: Forged in magma - burns through anything
LavaSpearBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Forged in magma - burns through anything

LavaMacheteBlock:0.Description: Molten blade that dismembers with burning precision
LavaMacheteBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Molten blade that dismembers with burning precision

LavaShovelBlock:0.Description: Digs through earth like it's butter - hot butter
LavaShovelBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Digs through earth like it's butter - hot butter

ItemsLauncherBlock:0.Description: Launches any type of block or object. Although expensive to craft, it's a powerful weapon like the musket. Be careful!
ItemsLauncherBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Launches any block or item. Expensive but powerful, similar to the musket.

FlameThrowerBlock:0.Description: The flamethrower is an incendiary weapon designed to project controlled fire. It was invented by Richard Fiedler in 1901 and first used in combat by the German army in 1915 during World War I. It works by using a fuel tank (usually thickened gasoline or oil) and compressed gas to propel the burning stream through a nozzle with ignition. To use it, the operator must insert Flame Bullets as ammunition, then pull the trigger to unleash fire against enemy fortifications or groups of soldiers. The advantage is that it supports up to 15 rounds (15/15), giving the player sustained firepower before reloading. The Flame Bullet is the secondary ammunition: incendiary projectiles that complement the flamethrower, useful for ranged attacks and maintaining pressure on the enemy.
FlameThrowerBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Improved musket with fuel tank and ignition system. Uses incendiary projectile or poison gas projectiles.

FlameBulletBlock:0.Description: Fire-based projectile for the flamethrower. On impact, it ignites terrain and creatures, may trigger explosions at high speed, and inflicts burn damage.
FlameBulletBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Incendiary ammo for flamethrower. Burns on impact.

FlameBulletBlock:1.Description: Chemical projectile for the flamethrower. Releases toxic gas that infects creatures with poison or disease, weakening them over time and dealing additional damage.
FlameBulletBlock:1.CRDescription:1: Poisonous ammunition for the flamethrower. Infects targets on impact.

RepeatCrossbowBlock:0.Description: An advanced version of the standard crossbow, optimized for sustained ranged fire. Unlike the normal crossbow which fires a single bolt before reloading, the Repeating Crossbow features an internal 8-bolt magazine and progressive tension system allowing continuous fire. It deals slightly less damage per shot than the normal crossbow but has a higher fire rate and faster reload. Compatible with special bolts: Copper, Iron, Diamond, Explosive, and Poison.
RepeatCrossbowBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Automatic crossbow with 8-arrow magazine - complex mechanical design

RepeatArrowBlock:0.Description: Lightweight bolt for repeating crossbows, made of copper. Provides moderate damage and high stability during rapid firing. Optimized to maintain accuracy in sustained automatic fire.
RepeatArrowBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Copper bolt for repeating crossbows. Moderate damage and high stability.

RepeatArrowBlock:1.Description: Reinforced iron bolt for repeating crossbows. Deals higher damage and better armor penetration than standard iron bolts while maintaining accuracy in sustained bursts.
RepeatArrowBlock:1.CRDescription:1: Iron bolt for repeating crossbows. Higher damage and better armor penetration.

RepeatArrowBlock:2.Description: High-tier bolt with a diamond tip designed for advanced repeating crossbows. Offers exceptional armor penetration and high sustained damage. Optimized for rapid burst firing.
RepeatArrowBlock:2.CRDescription:2: Diamond bolt for repeating crossbows. Exceptional armor penetration and high sustained damage.

RepeatArrowBlock:3.Description: Explosive bolt for repeating crossbows. Creates small explosions on impact. While individual damage is lower than standard explosive bolts, it allows rapid explosive bursts, ideal for crowd control and area denial.
RepeatArrowBlock:3.CRDescription:3: Explosive bolt for repeating crossbows. Rapid explosive bursts for crowd control.

RepeatArrowBlock:4.Description: Low-lethality poison bolt. Deals low initial damage but applies poison for 30 seconds. Ideal for weakening enemies without killing them instantly.
RepeatArrowBlock:4.CRDescription:4: Poisonous bolt for repeating crossbows. Low damage but applies poison effect.

RepeatArrowBlock:5.Description: Highly toxic bolt for repeating crossbows. Applies a severe poison effect for 100 seconds. Designed to weaken entire groups through rapid status application.
RepeatArrowBlock:5.CRDescription:5: Highly poisonous bolt for repeating crossbows. Applies severe poison effect.

AA12Block:0.Description: A gas-operated, magazine-fed automatic shotgun with an open-bolt design. Originally designed by Maxwell Atchisson in 1972 for military and law enforcement applications, it fires 12-gauge shotgun shells at a rate of 300 RPM with a magazine capacity of 8 to 20 rounds depending on the magazine. Its bullpup configuration and improved recoil system significantly reduce felt recoil, allowing controllable automatic fire even with powerful ammunition. In this mod, it uses AA12Bullet cartridges and fires 8 pellets per shell, being devastating at close to medium range.

M249Block:0.Description: The M249 Squad Automatic Weapon (SAW) is a belt-fed light machine gun that provides sustained automatic fire for infantry squads. Fires 5.56×45mm NATO rounds at a rate of 750-1000 RPM. Has a 100-round belt capacity and uses intermediate cartridges for manageable recoil during automatic fire. Requires M249 ammunition blocks for reloading.

NewG3Block:0.Description: A modern assault rifle with advanced polymer construction and enhanced accuracy. Designed for versatile combat situations, it provides a balanced mix of firepower and handling, making it suitable for mid to long-range engagements.

NewG3Bullet:0.Description: A 10-round magazine containing 7.62×51mm NATO ammunition for the G3 rifle. Provides reliable penetration and stopping power against armored targets.

MP5SSDBlock:0.Description: A suppressed submachine gun designed for stealth operations. Its integrated suppressor reduces muzzle flash and noise, making it ideal for covert missions and close-quarters combat.

MP5SSDBulletBlock:0.Description: A 12-round magazine with subsonic 9×19mm Parabellum rounds for the MP5SD. Optimized for quiet, effective engagements without sacrificing stopping power.

MendozaBlock:0.Description: A semi-automatic rifle renowned for its excellent accuracy and reliability. Ideal for marksmen who require precision at medium to long ranges without the need for full-auto fire.

MendozaBulletBlock:0.Description: 8 rounds of .308 Winchester ammunition, designed for precision shooting. Offers high accuracy and penetration, suitable for hunting and tactical engagements.

GrozaBlock:0.Description: A bullpup assault rifle featuring an integrated grenade launcher system. Compact yet powerful, it excels in close to medium-range combat with high versatility and firepower.

GrozaBulletBlock:0.Description: 10 rounds of special 9×39mm subsonic ammunition for the Groza rifle. Designed for stealth operations with reduced noise and effective armor penetration.

M249BulletBlock:0.Description: Ammunition box containing 5.56×45mm NATO rounds for the M249 SAW. Each box provides 100 rounds of belt-fed ammunition. Insert into the M249 to fully reload the weapon to its maximum capacity.

BaseballBatBlock:0.Description: A simple melee weapon with solid impact damage. Reliable, durable, and effective at close range.

AKBlock:0.Description: Legendary assault rifle firing 7.62×39mm rounds. Good accuracy, moderate recoil. Uses AK47Bullet ammunition. Fires at ~350 RPM.

BK43Block:0.Description: A simple and reliable double-barrel shotgun. Holds two rounds and is highly effective at close range due to pellet spread.

BK43BulletBlock:0.Description: Ammunition used by the BK-43. Effective at close range with strong stopping power and wide spread.

KABlock:0.Description: Advanced assault rifle that fires 5.56x45mm rounds. Unlike the AK-47, the KA offers superior accuracy, minimal recoil, and a 40-round magazine. Uses ammunition specifically designed for the KA.

KABulletBlock:0.Description: 5.56x45mm ammunition specifically designed for the KA rifle. Offers higher muzzle velocity, improved ballistics compared to standard ammunition, and a 40-round magazine capacity.

AUGBlock:0.Description: Bullpup assault rifle with low recoil. Uses 5.56×45mm NATO. Cycles through 6 different bullet types automatically. Integrated optical sight.

FamasBlock:0.Description: French bullpup with high rate of fire (~667 RPM). Uses NuevaBala4 projectiles. Compact design with good controllability.

G3Block:0.Description: Mexican assault rifle (FX05 Xiuhcoatl) firing powerful rounds. Uses NuevaBala projectiles. Good rate of fire and accuracy.

Izh43Block:0.Description: Double-barrel shotgun firing 8 pellets per shot. Devastating close-range. 2-round capacity, uses Izh43Bullet.

M4Block:0.Description: 5.56×45mm carbine firing 3-round bursts. Uses NuevaBala2 projectiles. 22-round magazine, excellent modularity.

Mac10Block:0.Description: Compact machine pistol with extreme rate of fire (~600 RPM). Uses NuevaBala3 projectiles. Intense recoil, 30-round magazine.

MinigunBlock:0.Description: Rotary machine gun firing NuevaBala6 projectiles at ~750 RPM. 100-round capacity, devastating suppression weapon.

P90Block:0.Description: Bullpup PDW with 900 RPM rate of fire. Cycles through 6 bullet types. 50-round magazine, 5.7×28mm rounds.

RevolverBlock:0.Description: Classic revolver firing powerful single shots. Uses NuevaBala4 projectiles. 6-round cylinder, high stopping power.

SCARBlock:0.Description: Modular battle rifle with excellent accuracy. Cycles through 6 bullet types. 600 RPM, 30-round magazine.

SniperBlock:0.Description: Bolt-action precision rifle for extreme long-range engagements. Equipped with high-magnification scope. Delivers single-shot kills with proper aim. Requires steady positioning and patience.

SPAS12Block:0.Description: Combat shotgun firing 8 pellets per shot. 8-round capacity. Can fire in pump or semi-auto modes.

SWM500Block:0.Description: Desert Eagle .50 caliber pistol with tremendous stopping power. Single-shot, uses NuevaBala4 projectiles. 5-round magazine.

UziBlock:0.Description: Iconic submachine gun with high rate of fire (~750 RPM). Uses NuevaBala2 projectiles. 30-round magazine.

AA12BulletBlock:0.Description: 8-round 12-gauge magazine for the AA-12 shotgun. Each shell contains 8 pellets that spread when fired, being especially effective against groups of enemies at close range. The ammunition is shotgun-type, specifically designed for the AA-12 feeding system.

AKBullet:0.Description: 30-round magazine for AK-47 rifle. Contains 7.62×39mm ammunition.

M4Bullet:0.Description: 22-round magazine for M4 carbine. Contains 5.56×45mm NATO ammunition.

SPAS12BulletBlock:0.Description: 8-round box of 12 gauge shells for SPAS-12 shotgun.

Mac10Bullet:0.Description: 30-round magazine for MAC-10. Contains .45 ACP ammunition.

UziBullet:0.Description: 32-round magazine for Uzi submachine gun. Contains 9×19mm Parabellum rounds.

G3Bullet:0.Description: 30-round magazine for FX05 Xiuhcoatl rifle. Contains 5.56×45mm NATO rounds.

MinigunBullet:0.Description: 100-round ammunition box for Minigun. Contains linked 7.62×51mm NATO belts.

Izh43Bullet:0.Description: 2-round set of 12 gauge shells for IZH-43 shotgun.

SWM500Bullet:0.Description: 7-round magazine for Desert Eagle pistol. Contains .50 Action Express rounds.

SniperBullet:0.Description: 5-round stripper clip for sniper rifle. Contains 7.62×51mm match-grade ammunition.

AUGBullet:0.Description: 30-round translucent magazine for Steyr AUG. Contains 5.56×45mm NATO rounds.

P90BulletBlock:0.Description: 50-round top-mounted magazine for FN P90. Contains 5.7×28mm rounds.

SCARBulletBlock:0.Description: 20-round magazine for FN SCAR-H. Contains 7.62×51mm NATO ammunition.

RevolverBulletBlock:0.Description: 6-round speedloader for revolver. Contains .357 Magnum ammunition.

FamasBulletBlock:0.Description: 25-round magazine for FAMAS rifle. Contains 5.56×45mm NATO rounds.

ClothingBlock:39.Description: A cool t-shirt featuring Digimon designs. Perfect for fans of the series who want to show off their love for these digital monsters.
ClothingBlock:39.CRDescription:0: A cool t-shirt featuring Digimon designs. Perfect for fans of the series who want to show off their love for these digital monsters.

ClothingBlock:40.Description: A helmet forged from molten rock. Provides great protection and warmth, shielding the head from both attacks and cold.
ClothingBlock:40.CRDescription:0: A helmet forged from molten rock. Provides great protection and warmth, shielding the head from both attacks and cold.

ClothingBlock:41.Description: A chestplate imbued with volcanic energy. Offers durable defense and insulation, keeping the torso warm in extreme climates.
ClothingBlock:41.CRDescription:0: A chestplate imbued with volcanic energy. Offers durable defense and insulation, keeping the torso warm in extreme climates.

ClothingBlock:42.Description: Leggings forged from volcanic stone. Reinforce the legs with the strength of lava and provide warmth against the cold.
ClothingBlock:42.CRDescription:0: Leggings forged from volcanic stone. Reinforce the legs with the strength of lava and provide warmth against the cold.

ClothingBlock:43.Description: Boots crafted from hardened lava. Improve endurance and speed while keeping the feet warm in freezing conditions.
ClothingBlock:43.CRDescription:0: Boots crafted from hardened lava. Improve endurance and speed while keeping the feet warm in freezing conditions.

ClothingBlock:44.Description: Tired of diamond armor failing against gunfire? This bulletproof metal helmet is built with lightweight materials, providing strong protection against armed NPCs and bandits without reducing mobility.
ClothingBlock:44.CRDescription:0: Tired of diamond armor failing against gunfire? This bulletproof metal helmet is built with lightweight materials, providing strong protection against armed NPCs and bandits without reducing mobility.

ClothingBlock:45.Description: Despite being made of metal, this bulletproof vest uses a lightweight structure that does not hinder movement. The ultimate solution when diamond armor fails against firearms.
ClothingBlock:45.CRDescription:0: Despite being made of metal, this bulletproof vest uses a lightweight structure that does not hinder movement. The ultimate solution when diamond armor fails against firearms.

ClothingBlock:46.Description: Metal bulletproof leggings designed to be surprisingly lightweight. They withstand firearm impacts without slowing you down, solving the weakness of diamond armor against bullets.
ClothingBlock:46.CRDescription:0: Metal bulletproof leggings designed to be surprisingly lightweight. They withstand firearm impacts without slowing you down, solving the weakness of diamond armor against bullets.

ClothingBlock:47.Description: Lightweight metal bulletproof boots that offer full protection without sacrificing speed. They complete the ideal set for facing armed bandits.
ClothingBlock:47.CRDescription:0: Lightweight metal bulletproof boots that offer full protection without sacrificing speed. They complete the ideal set for facing armed bandits.

ClothingBlock:48.Description: Inspired by the classic speed of Survivalcraft 2. These boots let you move incredibly fast, perfect for exploration, escaping danger, or reliving the original gameplay feel.
ClothingBlock:48.CRDescription:0: Inspired by the classic speed of Survivalcraft 2. These boots let you move incredibly fast, perfect for exploration, escaping danger, or reliving the original gameplay feel.

ClothingBlock:49.Description: Speed taken to the extreme, Survivalcraft 2 style. With these boots, you’ll cross the world at absurd speeds, ideal for fun, extreme exploration, or pure chaos.
ClothingBlock:49.CRDescription:0: Speed taken to the extreme, Survivalcraft 2 style. With these boots, you’ll cross the world at absurd speeds, ideal for fun, extreme exploration, or pure chaos.

ClothingBlock:50.Description: Simple and comfortable pants. They don’t offer special advantages, but they get the job done for everyday survival.
ClothingBlock:50.CRDescription:0: Simple and comfortable pants. They don’t offer special advantages, but they get the job done for everyday survival.

AntiTanksBulletBlock:0.Description: A special ammunition that will help us later. Use it wisely and only in emergencies if musket or shotgun bullets are ineffective in applying the necessary damage.
AntiTanksBulletBlock:0.CRDescription:0: Use it wisely if powerful heavy bosses have you surrounded and musket balls are ineffective.

AutoCannonWidget.Title: Auto-Cannon
AutoCannonWidget.HelpText:
Authors
Fire Dragon
Kike
----------
This weapon uses the first slot of the hotbar or the first available slot with an object. To save any changes, you must press 'Accept', or 'X' to discard. The spread and velocity settings determine the direction and distance of the projectiles.

To use it, simply hold right click if you are on PC, or hold the screen if you are on a mobile device, and it will automatically fire the times per second you have configured. Useful for shooting spawn eggs and generating creatures in large quantities in a short time.

You can also have fun launching fireworks or any other object.
